start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Phabricator in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: Space-delimited list of Phabricator repositories, e.g. `repo-1 repo-2`. If none provided would sync all repositories

rejectUnauthorized.title: Require Phabricator server certificate validation
rejectUnauthorized.description: Keep this option enabled if your Phabricator server has a certificate verified by a trusted authority. For self-signed certificates, disable this option.
